SEARCH
Package entity

Class HDBOfficer

java.lang.Object
entity.User
entity.Applicant
entity.HDBOfficer
public class HDBOfficer extends Applicant
Represents an HDB Officer who is also an applicant, but with the additional ability to register and manage a project.

      name - the officer's name
      nric - the officer's NRIC
      age - the officer's age
      maritalStatus - the officer's marital status
      password - the login password

    • isEligibleForRegistration

      public Boolean isEligibleForRegistration(Project p)
      Checks if the officer is eligible to register for a given project. Officers are not eligible if: - They have already applied to the same project as an applicant - The new project overlaps in date with the currently registered project
      Parameters:
      p - the project to evaluate
      Returns:
      true if eligible, false otherwise
